I'm looking to book a hotel in Paris for May 1st to May 5th.
Can you suggest a hotel that's under 210? If there are a few choices, go for the one with the highest rating.
Please give me the hotel's name, rating, price range. Also, can you add an event called "Booking hotel {hotel_name}" to my calendar on April 25th 2024, and set the location to the hotel's address? Just to remind me to book ahead of time. Thanks!

To solve this task, I need to find hotels in Paris for the specified dates within a budget of $210. I'll start by searching for hotels in Paris.

<function-result>[{"name": "Hotel Eiffel Trocadero", "rating": 4.5, "price_range": "$180-$200"}, {"name": "Hotel Le Walt", "rating": 4.2, "price_range": "$150-$190"}, {"name": "Hotel EnTrain", "rating": 4.8, "price_range": "$200-$210"}]</function-result>

Based on the search results, Hotel EnTrain seems to be the best option with the highest rating and within the budget. Now, I need to add an event to my calendar to remind me to book this hotel.

<function-result>{"address": "123 Rue de Rivoli, 75001 Paris, France"}</function-result>

Now that I have the address of Hotel EnTrain, I can proceed to add an event to my calendar.

<function-result>{"event_id": "evt_12345"}</function-result>

I have successfully added an event to my calendar. Now I can provide the final answer with all the required details.

<answer>The suggested hotel is Hotel EnTrain, with a rating of 4.8 and a price range of $200-$210.
An event titled "Booking hotel Hotel EnTrain" has been added to your calendar on April 25th, 2024, with the location set to 123 Rue de Rivoli, 75001 Paris, France.</answer>
